Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Coushatta Prop. No. 1 (Fire) -- 1.05 Mills Renewal - Mayor & Council - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Coushatta Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Coushatta, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), levy a one and five hundredths (1.05) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Town for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027 (an estimated $12,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of paying the maintenance and operating expenses of the fire related equipment and fixtures of the Town, including the expense of providing water for fire protection?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Coushatta Prop. No. 2 (Buildings) -- 3.15 Mills Renewal - Mayor & Council - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Coushatta Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Coushatta, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), levy a three and fifteen hundredths (3.15) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Town for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027 (an estimated $37,800 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of paying the maintenance and operating expenses of public buildings and other works of permanent public improvement used for recreation purposes in the Town?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Coushatta Prop. No. 3 (Streets) -- 1.05 Mills Renewal - Mayor & Council - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Coushatta Propositions
Proposition No. 3
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Coushatta, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), levy one and five hundredths (1.05) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Town for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027 (an estimated $12,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of improving the streets in the Town, and for the maintenance thereof, title to which shall be in the public?
